name: MinimumWage Early Access Alpha Build 0.0.3.5
description:
Welcome to Minimum Wage!

A Game about Drudgery, Drone-ery, Low Wages and even LOWER Expectations!

With the World in Lockdown and many folks unable to go out to work, it seems like the perfect time to release Minimum Wage into Early Access!

Take on 3 Different jobs in this Early Access Alpha Build of the game!

Explore a Totally 3D Main Menu that acts as your Apartment and Hub World!

Apply for jobs from the Newspaper in your Apartment-

- Office Janitor -

Get paid bottom dollar to pick up after lazy employees who all get paid better than you! Tidy away Caution Signs, Scrub Stains, Pick up Trash, clean up a VERY Poopy Bathroom and who knows, maybe you might earn enough to Buy Your Way Out!

Or buy schematics, craft Sponge-zookas, Trashzappers! Find an Friendly Cleaning Robot.. GIVE HIM HATS! (Or Her, impose whichever Gender fits you best!)

Snoop through peoples Desks, break into the Bosses Office! Find the keys to peoples secret stash of cash... STEAL IT!

- PC Technician -

So you Worked your way up and now work for a Small PC Building Business!

Complete Orders by Unboxing Various Components with the Patent Pending Box Cutter 9000, then Assemble the right Parts in the right configuration to complete the order!

Patented 'Red Stamp' Stamp Completed Orders, Stamp the Completed PC STAMP EVERYTHING!

Deposit the Assembled Machine in the Delivery box but Be Careful! if the order isnt correct , the cost of all those parts Comes out of YOUR Pay!

- Hospital Orderly -

As Everyone  knows a Hospital has to be kept a Clean and Sterile environment!

So Time to clean all those Bloody Scalpels, Bone Saws and Chain Saws, Dispose of those Severed Limbs and Used Syringes and Dont forget to return everything to its clearly Labelled Cubby fresh for Doctor Diddle and Nurse Fiddle to Operate again Tomorrow!

But Be Careful of all those Glass Beakers! Breakages Come out of YOUR PAY!

Make Sure To Monitor your Thirst Levels so you dont collapse on the job and keep an eye on that vent! If it Breaks Down the Place is gonna get MIGHTY HOT and thats going to accelerate your Thirst Meter!

And Dont forget to answer the phone when it rings! Theres ABSOLUTELY NO PENALTY for failing to.. but it gets Pretty Annoying...

As you complete jobs, more and more items and souveneirs from your different jobs will decorate your apartment Hub World!

I am one person and this was my First proper game in Unreal Engine 4, I started Work on it in early 2017 and worked for about 18 months til my Mom passed away April 2019 and I pretty much left it abandoned for a year till some friends I sent it to recommend I tidy it up and list it for sale as an Early Access Alpha, funds are tight and to continue working on the game I need it to start making money for me. I hope you all enjoy the game and thank you from the bottom of my heart to anyone who purchases the game. But Please Bear In Mind its Extremely Early Access but I hope that with some support from the community and feedback on how to improve it, that it will evolve and get better! Thank you for reading, I hope you enjoy Minimum Wage!
